# Tour Of C# Docs

> Introduction to C# for new developers covering syntax, types, and core concepts. C# is a cross-platform, object-oriented language with functional programming features. Start here to learn about classes, interfaces, generics, LINQ, and the .NET ecosystem.

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/tour-of-csharp/overview.md): New to C#? Learn the basics of the language. Start with this overview.
- [Language strategy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/tour-of-csharp/strategy.md): We keep evolving C# to meet the changing needs of developers and remain a state-of-the-art programming language. We will innovate eagerly and broadly in collaboration with C# developers
- [Tips for Java Developers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/tour-of-csharp/tips-for-java-developers.md): Are you new to C#, but experienced in Java? Here's a roadmap of what's familiar, and new features to learn in C#, and features in Java that aren't in C#.
- [Tips for JavaScript and TypeScript Developers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/tour-of-csharp/tips-for-javascript-developers.md): New to C#, but know JavaScript or TypeScript? Here's a roadmap of what's familiar, features in C# that aren't in JavaScript or TypeScript, and alternatives for features you use that aren't in C#
- [Tips for Python Developers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/tour-of-csharp/tips-for-python-developers.md): New to C#, but know Python? Here's a roadmap of what's familiar, features in C# that aren't in Python, and alternatives for Python features that aren't in C#.

## Topic Indices

- [Tutorials](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/tour-of-csharp/tutorials/llms.txt): 7 topics
